means: 不离正道的，坚定不移的

sentence.Network_en: Beyond the undeviating barbed - wire fences were clumps of golden rod.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一排排笔直的,用带刺的铁丝编扎的栅栏那一边,有一丛丛金黄色的秋麒麟草.

sentence.Network_en: Some people see evolution as an undeviating upward march from simple organisms to the very complex.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些人把演进视为从简单有机体向非常复杂的有机体不可逆转的上升过程.

means.word_mean: 1. going directly ahead from one point to another without veering or turning aside;
